title: Court Orders Second Look at Credit Card Surcharge Ban (Audio)
itunes:title: Court Orders Second Look at Credit Card Surcharge Ban (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Greg Stohr, Bloomberg News Supreme Court reporter and co-host of Bloomberg Radio's "Bloomberg Law,” discusses an unanimous Supreme Court ruling to set aside a lower court ruling on a New York law that bars merchants from imposing surcharges on credit-card purchases. He speaks with Bloomberg’s June Grasso and Michael Best.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
